document.title: DuOMAn Subjectivity Lexicon
document.intro: The DuOMAn Subjectivity Lexicon contains approximately 9,000 verbs, adverbs, substantives and adjectives which have been classified as having a (very) negative, neutral, or (very) positive connotation. The DuOMAn project focuses on the development of a set of Dutch language resources and tools for media analysis, specifically, for identifying and aggregating sentiments and opinions in online data sources, such as news and blogs. sentiment: negative, neutral, positive Het DuOMAn-subjectivitylexicon bevat ongeveer 9.000 werkwoorden, bijwoorden, substantieven en adjectieven waarvan aangegeven werd of ze een (zeer) negatieve, een neutrale of een (zeer) positieve gevoelswaarde hebben.

access.title: available for commercial and non-commercial organisation; user license required
